node.excerpt: After, 19 years since the previous game, Metroid Dread released this weekend and I'm not kidding when I say that this is a major milestone…

frontmatter.title: Weeknotes: First Of The Year — 26th January 2019

node.excerpt: Gotcha. Sorry, no, this isn’t the song by Skrillex. These are the first weeknotes I’ve published of 2019, hopefully soon to be followed by…
